meanings.sent1: The hurrying rabbit quickly hopped away from the fox.
meanings.sent2: She was always hurrying to finish her chores before sunset.
meanings.sent3: The hurrying squirrel forgot where it buried its nuts.
meanings.sent4: The hurrying clouds raced across the sky, chasing the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The hurrying river flowed swiftly through the valley, carrying fallen leaves along.

meanings.sent1: The hurrying students ran to catch the bus after school.
meanings.sent2: The hurrying wind blew the leaves off the trees in a frenzy.
meanings.sent3: The hurrying ants worked together to build their anthill in record time.
meanings.sent4: The hurrying cars on the highway created a blur of motion.
meanings.sent5: The hurrying shoppers dashed through the aisles to grab the last items on sale.

meanings.definition: To move or act with speed
meanings.sent1: She was hurrying to catch the train before it departed.
meanings.sent2: The chef was hurrying to finish cooking the meal for the hungry customers.
meanings.sent3: The cat was hurrying around the house, chasing after a playful ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The workers were hurrying to complete the construction project before the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The children were hurrying to clean up their toys before bedtime.
